content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 25.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -11.5, 25.0)
- Steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5)
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)

### Copper plate mine at position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, 5.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, 5.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that the positions of the boiler and steam engine are correctly aligned for the pipe connection. Check for any obstacles or incorrect placements that may prevent the connection.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended position.
